trans-unit.source: StorSimple system limits table
trans-unit.target: StorSimple system limits table

trans-unit.source: Describes system limits and recommended sizes for StorSimple components and connections.
trans-unit.target: Describes system limits and recommended sizes for StorSimple components and connections.

trans-unit.source: Limit identifier
trans-unit.target: Limit identifier

trans-unit.source: Limit
trans-unit.target: Limit

trans-unit.source: Comments
trans-unit.target: Comments

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of storage account credentials
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of storage account credentials

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of volume containers
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of volume containers

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of volumes
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of volumes

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of schedules per bandwidth template
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of schedules per bandwidth template

trans-unit.source: A schedule for every hour, every day of the week (24*7).
trans-unit.target: A schedule for every hour, every day of the week (24*7).

trans-unit.source: Maximum size of a volume
trans-unit.target: Maximum size of a volume

trans-unit.source: 64 TB
trans-unit.target: 64 TB

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of iSCSI connections
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of iSCSI connections

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of iSCSI connections from initiators
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of iSCSI connections from initiators

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of access control records per device
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of access control records per device

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of volumes per backup policy
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of volumes per backup policy

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of backups retained per backup policy
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of backups retained per backup policy

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of schedules per backup policy
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of schedules per backup policy

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of snapshots of any type that can be retained per volume
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of snapshots of any type that can be retained per volume

trans-unit.source: This includes local snapshots and cloud snapshots.
trans-unit.target: This includes local snapshots and cloud snapshots.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of snapshots that can be present in any device
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of snapshots that can be present in any device

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of volumes that can be processed in parallel for backup, restore, or clone
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of volumes that can be processed in parallel for backup, restore, or clone

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>If there are more than 16 volumes, they will be processed sequentially as processing slots become available.<html></html><html></html>New backups of a cloned or a restored volume cannot occur until the operation is finished.<html></html><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>If there are more than 16 volumes, they will be processed sequentially as processing slots become available.<html></html><html></html>New backups of a cloned or a restored volume cannot occur until the operation is finished.<html></html><html></html>

trans-unit.source: Restore and clone recover time
trans-unit.target: Restore and clone recover time

trans-unit.source: < 2 minutes
trans-unit.target: < 2 minutes

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>The volume is made available within 2 minutes of restore or clone operation, regardless of the volume size.<html></html><html></html>The volume performance may initially be slower than normal as most of the data and metadata still resides in the cloud. Performance may increase as data flows from the cloud to the StorSimple device.<html></html><html></html>The total time to download metadata depends on the allocated volume size. Metadata is automatically brought into the device in the background at the rate of 5 minutes per TB of allocated volume data. This rate may be affected by Internet bandwidth to the cloud.<html></html><html></html>The restore or clone operation is complete when all the metadata is on the device.<html></html><html></html>Backup operations cannot be performed until the restore or clone operation is fully complete.
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>The volume is made available within 2 minutes of restore or clone operation, regardless of the volume size.<html></html><html></html>The volume performance may initially be slower than normal as most of the data and metadata still resides in the cloud. Performance may increase as data flows from the cloud to the StorSimple device.<html></html><html></html>The total time to download metadata depends on the allocated volume size. Metadata is automatically brought into the device in the background at the rate of 5 minutes per TB of allocated volume data. This rate may be affected by Internet bandwidth to the cloud.<html></html><html></html>The restore or clone operation is complete when all the metadata is on the device.<html></html><html></html>Backup operations cannot be performed until the restore or clone operation is fully complete.

trans-unit.source: Thin-restore availability
trans-unit.target: Thin-restore availability

trans-unit.source: Last failover
trans-unit.target: Last failover

trans-unit.source: Maximum client read/write throughput (when served from the SSD tier)*
trans-unit.target: Maximum client read/write throughput (when served from the SSD tier)*

trans-unit.source: 920/720 MB/s with a single 10GbE network interface
trans-unit.target: 920/720 MB/s with a single 10GbE network interface

trans-unit.source: Up to 2x with MPIO and two network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Up to 2x with MPIO and two network interfaces.

trans-unit.source: Maximum client read/write throughput (when served from the HDD tier)*
trans-unit.target: Maximum client read/write throughput (when served from the HDD tier)*

trans-unit.source: Maximum client read/write throughput (when served from the cloud tier)*
trans-unit.target: Maximum client read/write throughput (when served from the cloud tier)*

trans-unit.source: Read throughput depends on clients generating and maintaining sufficient I/O queue depth.
trans-unit.target: Read throughput depends on clients generating and maintaining sufficient I/O queue depth.

trans-unit.source: * Maximum throughput per I/O type was measured with 100 percent read and 100 percent write scenarios.
trans-unit.target: * Maximum throughput per I/O type was measured with 100 percent read and 100 percent write scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Actual throughput may be lower and depends on I/O mix and network conditions.
trans-unit.target: Actual throughput may be lower and depends on I/O mix and network conditions.
